knowledgeGraph.title: Lucile Packard Children's Hospital Stanford
knowledgeGraph.type: Children's hospital in Palo Alto, California
knowledgeGraph.description: Lucile Packard Children's Hospital at Stanford is a nationally ranked women's and children's hospital which is part of the Stanford University Health system. The hospital is located adjacent to the campus at 725 Welch Road, Palo Alto, California.

organic.title: Lucile Packard Children's Hospital Stanford
organic.snippet: The phone number is (650) 497-8596. Our spiritual care area—including sanctuary and healing garden—can be found on the first floor of the Main building.

organic.title: Key Phone Numbers - Stanford Medicine Children's Health
organic.snippet: Key Phone Numbers ; MyChart, (877) 339-9895 (24 hours a day, 7 days a week) or mychart@stanfordchildrens.org ; Office of Patient Experience, (650) 498-4847.

organic.title: Lucile Packard Children's Hospital Stanford at 725 Welch Road
organic.snippet: 725 Welch Road Palo Alto, CA 94304 Phone: 650-497-8000 For more information about navigation & parking in Stanford Children's Health, visit Finding Your Way.

organic.title: Contact and FAQ - Lucile Packard Foundation for Children's Health
organic.snippet: All monetary donations should be submitted directly to the Lucile Packard Foundation for Children's Health (400 Hamilton Ave., Suite 340, Palo Alto, CA 94301).

organic.title: Lucile Packard Children's Hospital (LPCH) - Stanford Medicine
organic.snippet: Nationally ranked and internationally recognized, our 311-bed hospital is devoted entirely to pediatrics and obstetrics. Our division is very active in treating ...
